title: Demagogue

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - During the day, you may reveal as the Mayor and have 3 votes. The day after revealing as the mayor, you are revealed as the Demagogue and return to having 1 vote per day.

fields.name: Destiny:
fields.value: Live to see the town lose.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Have each living Peasant fulfill their Destiny.
